########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources
    opus_rtp_sink_impl.cc
    opus_rtp_source_impl.cc
    sip_signaling_impl.cc
)

set(PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources "${PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE SHARED ${PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime opus ${PJSUA2_LIBRARIES})
target_include_directories(gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
	PUBLIC /usr/include/opus/
	PUBLIC /usr/include/
	PUBLIC ${PJSUA2_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_PSCR_LMR2LTE_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-PSCR_LMR2LTE)

if(NOT test_PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_PSCR_LMR2LTE_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("PSCR_LMR2LTE_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
